headline.print_headline: Crew of Doomed South Korea Ferry Drank Beer While Awaiting Rescue: Media
headline.main: Crew of Doomed South Korea Ferry Drank Beer While Awaiting Rescue: Media

lead_paragraph: Some crew of a ferry that capsized in April in South Korea's worst maritime disaster in 44 years drank beer while waiting for rescue, one of them told a court, in an admission likely to fuel anger at their conduct during the final moments of the mishap.
